title: tokentoker
author: tokentoker
content: https://pypi.org/project/monero/I'm a beginner programmer and created a simple address generator based on hex dice rolls. How safe is it to put a large amount of money in this? Idk if I'm being paranoid. (I'm using Ubuntu)

comments.author: emesik
comments.body: As the main author, I can reassure you that most of the functionality there is a wrapper around RPC of `monero-wallet-rpc`, which you may quickly check in the source. The main exceptions are:1. subaddress generation (instantly verifiable with an official wallet),2. output recognition,3. seed/wordlist operations.You may skip the latter two easily. If you're worried about anything particular, just ask.Cheers,
